snippet: An unsealed indictment offered new details about an investigation involving nearly $200,000 worth of crystal methamphetamine and low-level dealers’ easy access to Mexican suppliers.
abstract: Unsealed indictment offers new details about a Drug Enforcement Administration  investigation involving nearly $200,000 worth of crystal methamphetamine, most likely manufactured in Mexico, being sold in New York City's Chinatown.
lead_paragraph: An unsealed indictment offered new details about an investigation involving nearly $200,000 worth of crystal methamphetamine and low-level dealers’ easy access to Mexican suppliers.

headline.seo: Undercover Methamphetamine Operation Leads to City’s Chinese Enclaves
headline.main: As Drug Routes Shift, a Meth Trail Leads to Chinatown
headline.print_headline: As Drug Routes Shift, a Meth Trail Leads to Chinatown

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
